Package neuron_based.layers

Class NeuronLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • neuron_based.layers.NeuronLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InnerNeuronLayer, InputNeuronLayer, OutputNeuronLayer
    public abstract class NeuronLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class contain all basic methods and attributes of a Neuron based Layer.
    Author:
    OdinhengeT
    See Also:
    NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork, InputNeuronLayer, InnerNeuronLayer, OutputNeuronLayer, Neuron

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NeuronLayer​(int nbrNeurons, int nbrLinks)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getNbrLinks()
      Returns the number of links each Neuron in the Layer has.
      int getNbrNeurons()
      Returns the number of Neurons (excluding eventual BiasNeurons) present in the Layer.
      Neuron getNeuronAt​(int index)
      Returns the Neuron at index index in the Layer, may return a BiasNeurons.
      Neuron[] getNeurons()
      Returns all the Neurons in the Layer.
      abstract double[] getOutput()
      Returns the output of the Layer.
      void input​(double[] input)
      Gives each non-BiasNeuron a new input given by corresponding element in double[] input.
      abstract java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the Layer.
      void updateWeights​(double[][] deltaWeights)
      Takes a double[][], one double[] for each neuron in the network (including eventual BiasNeurons) and updates their weights with their updateWeight method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuronLayer

        public NeuronLayer​(int nbrNeurons,
                   int nbrLinks)

    • Method Detail

      • input

        public void input​(double[] input)
        Gives each non-BiasNeuron a new input given by corresponding element in double[] input. Input is updated by the input(double) method in Neuron.
        Parameters:
        input - double[] with an input for each Neuron in the Layer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is of incorrect length

      • getNbrNeurons

        public int getNbrNeurons()
        Returns the number of Neurons (excluding eventual BiasNeurons) present in the Layer.

      • getNbrLinks

        public int getNbrLinks()
        Returns the number of links each Neuron in the Layer has.

      • getNeurons

        public Neuron[] getNeurons()
        Returns all the Neurons in the Layer.

      • getNeuronAt

        public Neuron getNeuronAt​(int index)
        Returns the Neuron at index index in the Layer, may return a BiasNeurons.
        Parameters:
        index - index of Neuron to return

      • getOutput

        public abstract double[] getOutput()
        Returns the output of the Layer.

      • updateWeights

        public void updateWeights​(double[][] deltaWeights)
        Takes a double[][], one double[] for each neuron in the network (including eventual BiasNeurons) and updates their weights with their updateWeight method.
        Parameters:
        deltaWeights - a double[][] containing all the weight nudges for each neuron in the Layer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if deltaWeights does not have the same length as the number of Neurons in the Layer (Including eventual BiasNeurons)

      • toString

        public abstract java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of the Layer.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
